body:
I remember the staff spotlights thing and I thought players of Avicus could get known and have an interview with me on Skype message. The interview will consist of questions like Hobbies, IRL ect. I will only hold the interviews on message not voice or face call because I will copy and paste your answers word for word. If you would like an interview please tell me and leave me either your your Skype name, Facebook name or kik name, so I can interview you.

P.S Your answers will be posted on the forums.

EDIT:
A lot of people liked the idea and asked for an interview so when I get home today I will be holding some interviews judging on who asked first. If you don't get your interview posted today, don't worry you will get your interview posted ASAP as my top priority on the forums :D

Waiting List: 
cinnamoncroc000
S3M3L
resepignev
99250
xLininger
lunax564
TNTTurtles
steven5703
